name: The Year 3000 (beta 1.0)
description:
you are stuck in space. that's great. but now you have to survive  against aliens in a galaxy. worst yet, you are running low on oxygen, AND the generators are glitching! thankfully you have a manual override button to activate the generators.

survive 3000 years in the future! 

support my channel here:
